resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El misterio de la cripta embrujada</string>
            <string language="en">"The Mystery of the Haunted Crypt"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"das Geheimnis der frequentierten Krypta"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"le mystère de la crypte hantée"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"o mistério do crypt assombrado"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il mistero della cripta frequentata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Το μυστήριο συχνασμένο crypt"</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Guia de lectura interactiva de la novel·la d'Eduardo Mendoza. Consta de les següents seccions: "¿Quién lo ha escrito?" (amb informació sobre l'autor i enllaços), "Antes de leer" (amb indicacions prèvies a la lectura), "Comprensión" (amb un test autoavaluatiu de resposta múltiple) i "Después de leer" (amb exercicis interactius sobre lèxic, gramàtica i comprensió lectora).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive reading guide for Eduardo Mendoza's novel with the following sections: "Who wrote it?" (with information on the author and links), "Before reading" (with a multiple-choice self-assessment test) and "After reading" (with interactive exercises on vocabulary, grammar and reading comprehension).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere policíac</string>
            <string language="en">detective fiction</string>
            <string language="es">género policíaco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">narració</string>
            <string language="en">narration</string>
            <string language="es">narración</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Leseanleitung für Eduardo Mendozas 
Roman mit den folgenden Kapiteln: "wer schrieb ihn?" (mit 
Informationen über den Autor und Links), "vor Messwert" (mit einem 
Mehrfachwahl Selbstbewertung Test) und "nach Messwert" (mit 
interaktiven Übungen auf Wortschatz-, Grammatik- und Leseerfassen).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide interactif de lecture pour le roman 
d'Eduardo Mendoza avec les sections suivantes : "qui l'a 
écrit?" (avec l'information sur l'auteur et liens), "avant la 
lecture" (avec un essai de multiple-choix art de l'auto-portrait-assessment) et 
"après la lecture" (avec des exercices interactifs sur la 
compréhension de vocabulaire, de grammaire et de lecture).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia interativa da leitura para a novela de 
Eduardo Mendoza com as seguintes seções: "quem a escreveu?" 
(com informação no autor e ligações), "antes da leitura" 
(com um teste do self-assessment da múltiplo-escolha) e "após a 
leitura" (com exercícios interativos na compreensão do vocabulário,
da gramática e da leitura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida interattiva della lettura per il romanzo di 
Eduardo Mendoza con le seguenti sezioni: "chi lo ha scritto?" 
(con le informazioni sull'autore e collegamenti), "prima di 
lettura" (con una prova di valutazione di se stesso di 
multiplo-scelta) e "dopo la lettura" (con le esercitazioni interattive
su comprensione di vocabolario, di grammatica e della lettura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός οδηγός ανάγνωσης για το μυθιστόρημα του 
Eduardo Mendoza's με τα εξής τμήματα: "Ποιος το 
έγραψε;" (με τις πληροφορίες για το συντάκτη και τις 
συνδέσεις), "πρίν διαβάζει" (με μια πολλαπλής επιλογής δοκιμή 
αυτοαξιολόγησης) και "μετά από να διαβάσει" (με τις διαλογικές 
ασκήσεις στο λεξιλόγιο, τη γραμματική και την ανάγνωση της 
κατανόησης).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">detective Erfindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzählung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fiction révélatrice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">récit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fiction detective</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">narration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">romanzo detective</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">narration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μυθιστοριογραφία ιδιωτικών αστυνομικών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αφήγηση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
